name: Escape the Unknown: Awaken the Realm
name_original: Escape the Unknown: Awaken the Realm
description:
Escape the Unknown: Awaken the Realm is visual novel fantasy RPG, where you step into the shoes of a hero in the making as you explore dangerous dungeons to uncover the mystery behind your identity and save the realm!

Key Features
  • Six dungeons to explore, each with its own challenges to face.
  • A colorful cast of voice acted friends and foes.
  • Various puzzles that block your path through the dungeon to valuable loot!
  • Strategic combat against opponents each with their own weaknesses and resistances.
  • A plethora of weapons, armor, and magic to wield against opponents.
  • A world filled with rich lore waiting to be uncovered by the inquisitive adventurer.

As the mystery behind the world is uncovered, your journal will update to keep track of your progress.

Uncover the mystery, save the world, awaken the realm!
